'''The Mad Flower at the End of the Road''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series VI]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs paralyze the [[Electro Regisvine]] by attacking its corolla when the Electro Regisvine emits a beam of thunderous light.
